content.detailedDescription: The object has been here since mars close aproach more and more people arenoticing it nightly i am sure that it will be there again tonight . someoneneeds to come and see this a.S.A.P. i just moved here , but the residents of thearea will not come forward and aknowledge that something might be going on. theobject is also near a military base fort brag . i am concerned

1. i was sitting in my vehicle right after lunch,talking to my mother on cell phone.2. i was overlooking a jobsite when a bright silvery light caught my attentionas it rose over a tree line about 300 away. it rose slowly but steadily until iteither went behind a cloud or through it. i estimate the clouds were 1 to 2thousand feet...It came thru the clouds and continued to a point that would beabout 35 to 40 degrees above the horizon. i thought it may have been a planelanding light...But i was too close to hartsfield airport for a plane to be onthat north to south route. as the object reached the peak it stopped and justsat there. i told my mother on the phone that i think im having my first ufoexperienceand became very interested in the object. i took out mybinoculars,switched off the engine and steadied them on my open door. the binoc.Are a 16x50 bushnell...I brace and focused on the object. it was clearly aspherical object, cream colored and hovering..The perimeter of the object seemedto shimmy a little but i think that may have been the binoculars. i told my callwhat was happening and out of nowhere a second object appeared at a 50 or 60degree above and to the east of 1. 2 moved downward....Stopped..Accended to itsoriginal elevation then stopped...Then 1slowly approached 2..At arms lenght i would say they were about two fingersapart...They moved in unison to the east, stopped,then very slowly moved to thes.W. thats when i realized i needed a witness..I saw a heavy equipment operatornorth of me..I got into my vehicle...Drove about 200 watching all the time. justas i got near the operator the objects winked out of sight..
content.summary: I saw two shining orbs over atlanta

content.detailedDescription: Looking northeast from my second story kitchen window at 1000 pm, i noticed abright star-like object about 25 degrees above the horizon.  it was not asbright as mars at the recent close approach, but it was the brightest star inthe northeast quadrant of the sky. the weather was clear and calm with noclouds.  the star attracted my attention due to a pronounced twinkling effect,and what i saw as a rapidly changing colors red, green, white, blue, purple. the light was located over the top of a local mountain, and appeared to be athigh altitude.  when i first saw the star, i noticed briefly a similar flashinglight on the plain in front of the mountain the view from the window is quiteextensive for many miles. this ground light disappeared.  after watching thelight in the sky for 10 minutes through low-power binoculars, i videotaped theobject for some time on a hitachi ntsc 8mm video camera with x400 digital zoom.I have a video of over ten minutes. it remained in the sky for at least onehour, when i tired of watching it.  i suspected it was a star, high altitudeballoon, or satellite reflection that was being colored by an atmosphericphenomenon such as ice crystals.   however, when i viewed the tape the next day,i am not certain this is the explanation. the colors and dynamics of the lightare quite unusual. it may have been a prank device of some sophistication.
I cant they are controling me

content.summary: Pulsating yellow light in low clouds

content.detailedDescription: We were on a camping trip in the black mountains about 45 miles north ofdowntown phoenix.  we first felt an abundance of static electricity in the calmnight air.  we stepped out of our tent to get some air when we saw numerousswirling lights.  we were all very startled and stayed close together notknowing what to expect.  we watched intensely as we saw the lights merge intoone and slowly descend into a clearing approximately 75 feet away.  we walkedtowards the object and saw three beings walk out and slowly look over theircraft as if something was wrong with it.  they beings looked man like but walkedin an exaggerated upright way and very stiffly.  it was at this moment that wewere noticed and we all walked toward the beings against our wishes.  it feltlike we were on a treadmill being drawn toward the craft.  the next 45 minutesare very hurtful and make me sick to even think about. i will gladly speak tosomeone in person about the experience.  we were all violated in different ways.

Eating lunch on a park bench. noticed silver ball in sky stationary then movingaway to the south east. about  a minute later a canadian forces f18 flew in theexact same direction and altidude as the object. seeing an airforce f18 or anykind of military presence in canada and toronto is rare. funny thing also iseemed to forgot all about this for about a year afterwrd.  oh well.
content.summary: Silver reflective shere in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Date  92303 time  apx 1845 weather conditions clear with very few clouds, none in direct los of object. duration 5-10 seconds location of sighting  directly north of the whiteland exit on i65 heading north. state  in distance to ufo  unknown ufo size  size of grain of rice held at arms length. ufo shape  appeared oval from side ufo color  silver, appeared to be reflecting the sun. number of witnesses  myself.  passenger was asleep. details of sighting  i noticed the object after i passed the whiteland exit going north on i65.  i attempted to identify it since i knew that there was an air lane from the indy airport along there.  the object did not appear to be moving.  i watched it for approximately 5-10 seconds before i glanced down to make sure that i wasn't going to rear end another car and when i looked up it was gone.  i scanned the sky to see if  i could reacquire it but there was no trace of in the entire horizon.  i then checked my gps that i have on my dash to get the bearing and time.  bearing was 344 degrees and the object was approximately 50-60 degrees above the horizon. i am usually pretty good at identifying aircraft and other objects from my years in the military, but this one was either too distant or something i didn't recognize as an aircraft.

I arose at 3aam in morning my attention was drawn to this wonderful sight of alarge outer ring of lights with an inner ring , slowly revolving and then movingto right and back again , i awoke my wife and we just stood at thewindow watching in wonderment at this sight, we observed this just at over treetop level,at first we thought maybe it was some sort of laser efect but we livein the heart of the countryside, so there was no question of any other man madething creating this ,it just hovered with the inner and outer ring of lightsslowly revolving and then again moving say a few hundred feet to the left andback again it was in sight for 45 minutes or more then again slowly,moved offsouth west,our observation was due south,we have since been trying to find alogical reason for this but cant so felt i must contact someone and tell them ofthis truly i can only explain it as a calming wondeful moment , i look out everyearly morning hoping for a return of this phenomina ,please contact and let ushave your veiws on this .Is there anyone in yhis part of france we could talk toabout this.Sincerely yours graham  pauline winston
Looking at a card machine.The machine turned off.1. a rocket.2.Asaucer.Telling.Flying.It dissapeared.

I was returning home from a meeting and had just reached the us 23 overpass onsherman road when i saw the blimp-like object hovering in the distance over aneighbors house.  the object was east and to the north slightly, when firstobserved.  it moved hovering slowly across my path and disappeared headingsouth.The object resembled a large blimp like structure with flashing colored lights(red and green).  as i drove closer i noticed that it did not have a tail likeblimps.  i rolled the window down expecting sounds of activity, but there was nonoise.  it gave me a rather eerie feeling for a couple of minutes as though iwere being watched and then it suddenly disappeared taking off.  it suddenlyseemed to gain energy and swiftly move out of sight before i could get a betterlook at it.  it left like a bullet from a gun.
content.summary: Blimp-like object seen over milan, michigan

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home in a westerly direction with my father in the front seat ofthe car.  i saw the object travelling on a parallel course with the car for abrief second, and took it to be a shooting star.  when i looked back asplit-second later, i saw that it was bright blue and glowing and had anoval-like shape.  i turned to my father who confirmed he had seen the object. he insists that it disappeared instantly, but i could not confirm that as i wasdriving, and it was only after the event that i realised the significance.  theweather was very clear and the moon very bright, and, i have to admit, quiteblue itself, so my heartfelt belief is that it was a shooting star, and a trickof the light made it appear to be oval-shaped and blue.  it could not have beenany terrestrial object as it was very far away and covered such a distance inthe sky it would have had to be either travelling at abnormal speeds, or indeeda meteor travelling outside the atmosphere.  however, should it have turned outto be something else, i did not want to report this after such a discovery  ithink you know what i mean.Nb.  your site will not allow me to submit without choosing a state or province,but this sighting did not occur in the usa.

I dont remember exactly what month or day it was although i do remember it wassummer.  i was in my house in my bedroom asleep.  i woke up thirsty and thoughtbriefly that my lamp next to the window was too bright.  i got up to turn it offand found that it wasnt on, and thats when i realized the light was comingthrough the closed blinds on the window which faces the east.  i looked over atthe clock thinking i mustve slept into the next day and saw that it was 1250, myclock at the time didnt have an am or pm indicator so i thought it was almost 1in the afternoon.  i opened the blinds and saw that it was still black outsideand that the light was coming from above my house.  i strained my neck upwardsand saw a large object, the top of which wasnt visible.  it was circular and onehemishphere of it was as large as my house.  it had a number of lights, allcircular, around the edge of the side that was facing me.  they were flashingdifferent colors, but all of the lights flashing at one time were the samecolor, such as white lights flashed with white lights and etc.  they were thelights i described earlier and i dont remember the exact pattern but it wasobvious that it was a pattern.  i stared at it for about a minute or so, i thenturned to head to the ground floor my room is on the 2nd floor and outside tosee it better.  i hit my leg on the corner of my bed and nearly fell over fromthe pain i ended up with a nice bruise the next day.  i glanced at the clock andit was 1252 and then i ran downstairs and outside to see the thing better.  wheni got outside i stared up and thats when i first heard the humming.  it was avery very low pitched hum, something that reminded me of power lines humming orsomething electrical.  the lights kept flashing in their pattern and what feltlike 2 minutes later all of the lights on the object shut off.  then they allcame back on for a second or two and then the object shot off into the distance,in less than a second it was the size of a star againist the sky and then it wasgone.  i walked back inside, dumbfounded, thinking id
content.summary: Very large circular object with lights

content.detailedDescription: About a month and a half ago i dont know the exact date but it was the samenight that planes flew over pres bushs ranch in crawford my wife was outsidelooking at the stars when she hollard at me to come outside when i got there isaw in the sky a large glowing spheremoving from the southwest to the northeastat a high rate of speed altitude was from 5000 to 10000 ft the craft made nosound and covered the whole horizon in about 1 minute i am a private pilot so iknow planes was no plane last night we seen it again slightly diffrant flightplan same altitude but it came from due south to north east but about half wayacross the horizon it shot strait up towards space and dissapeared last nightsevents were witnessed by 8 adults and 2 children the craft weveseen is aconstant bright glow no flashing beacons are such and no soundmy wife and i sawa news rteport several weeks ago about similar lights being seen in californiaand it showed a vidio and the lights looked exactly like what weve been seeingthey said the only explanation they could come up with was it s theinternational space station well all i can say is if it is than the spacestation is in our atmosphere i will be glad to answer any futher questions onthis subject by phone or email thank you dennis howell

Lights in the sky on a cigar shaped blimp like object.This object was floatinglike a leaf falling dipping up and down with a low hum sound.It paused for amoment and it looked like there were smaller crafts flying around it whichseemed to me to be those black helcoptors that are silent.The object continuedon out of our sight.This took place out in the orange groves so we were able tosee everything very clearly.As we drove down the road a little whole later wesaw the police had blocked off a street and that a power pole had exploded andwas down.The power in that area was out.I also noticed 5 us marshels drivingaround with thier lights going but no sirens.They were driving around theneighborhoods looking for somthing.Also as i passed through a neighborhood abouta mile from where the power pole had blown i noticed a spectrum of rainbow likelight on the garage to my left.I thought it was strange so i backed up and droveby the house again..There it was again the rainbow like light on the garage ofthe house to my left.I told the people i was with and i backed up yet again andit happened once more.I then looked to my right and saw a large van in thedriveway of the house to my right that said xray on it.For whatever reason ibelieve i was being exrayed with a spectroscope.Since that day i have beenexperienceing high pitched sounds and frequencies...That was over 10 years ago.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object with lights that blew power po

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were sitting on a wooden jungle jim behind moon mt. elementry school talking late at night. it was a calm very quiet night. i believe it may have been in fall. for some reason i looked up at the stars . we lived at the edge of the desert with a mountian to the east of us. i thought it was a hangglider with red lights at the nose and tips of a plane. i told scott what the hell is he doing at night hang gliding. then i relized i could see the stars in between the lights. the objects moved in perfect triangular formation very, veryslow no noise, like a dead calm. they circled right over head staying in a perfect formation,scott ran home to get a telescope. i watched them move slowly torwards s. mountain then picking up speed. once over s. mountain one shot off to the left torwards space the other two shot right in a flash torwards space at an unbeliveable speed. by the time scott got back they were gone. i have only told this to family. i try to watch every program that stanton friedman is on this ismy first time for telling this to any one outside the family. i believe 3 days after this their was an article in the paper that somewhere in the middle east some people saw the exact same thing we saw. this happend a long time ago but i remember it like yesterday. till this day i have not seen any thing on earth like i saw that night. thank you tony sasso

On the 16 of sept i was on temporary duty with the air force talking on a cellphone to my wife when i noticed blinking lights at about 5000ft approx 10 milesaway that remained in one place.  i fly on military helicopters and the lightsequence and hover height didnt seem right.  i got my friends, a paramedic,survival instructor, chaplain.  using binoculars we saw four to five lights thatwere arranged in a square or diamond if object moved.  it would stay still for10 min, then move out of view.  we thought it was gone.  within minutes it hadreturned.  the lights would blink red, blue, green, white randomly or flashingbut not like plane or helicopter.  i know we had no helicopters operating atthat time because i would have been on it.  we were confused and shocked becausewe couldnt explain it.  it would also appear to dart around.  ive spent longperiods outside at night and in the past have thought stars darted around.  thiswas different.  the next night the same thing happened but in a differentlocation in the sky.  this was witnessed by two new witness. a doctor ofpsychology and a chief master seargent.  they agreed it was unexplained.  it wassuggested at the time to call the local sheriff but dismissed as stupid idea. any ideas you have to shed light on this sighting would be appreciated.  thanks,dennis hooten

Having fun while writing a fony story about people and what they do withthemselves at night. so i finnished it and an alien mooned me through my windowmy friend bob was mezmerized and started making out with it until i told himthat he was making out with its butt. he turned and looked at me with achocolate mustash he laughed and continued then a giant blue light shown throughthe window the next thing i knew i was being extreamly violated it was rapeingbob and jeffry but bob still seemed to like it every time it stoped he wouldyell llllllllllooooooooooonnnnnnnnnnggggggggeeeeeeeerrrrrrrrrrrso jeffry ran to one feeling jelous and started making out with another oneuntill ii told him it was a guy. he looked content and stardted again so any waywe were having fun righting a phony article to some phony web sit titledohiomufon.Com and wondering if it was a gouvernment sight so we startedwrighting this story that kind of like this having fun me and my friends werewriting a phony story called what people do with there dogs at nightso ifinnished it and an alien mooned me through my windowmy friend bob was mezmerized and started making out with it until i told himthat he was making out w

I was sitting in my hot tub with my girlfriend and i seen something that i thought was a star. i noticed what i thought was a star because i remembered it from the night before. but tonight this object seemed to glow red and turn blue. i thought maybe it was an aircraft but it seemed to be hovering in one spot for along time. finally this object seemed to be getting lower to the ground. i left and went back inside, and when i came back out, this object was nowhere to be seen.

Tues. evening96 sept. 16, 200396 approx. 900pm pdt96 temp. 65 approx.96 conditions clear skies, quiet, calm, with little to no wind.While in my backyard stargazing with my telescope iwe observed a very brightapprox. magnitude2b1.093double-flashing94 pulse of light. this was observed 7 times in total over a 25min period in anarea of the sky covering approx. 10deg n to s and 5deg e tow and more or lesscentered on the star altair, in the constellation aquila.While targeting an area of sky near altair through my telescopes telrad finderin order to start sweeping the sky to visualize the dumbbell nebula m27 i firstobserved the93double-flashing94 pulse of light approx. 1-2deg n of altair. i initially dismissed thisobservation as being the effect of some sort of visual aberration or otherinconsequential anomaly. approx. 1-2min later i observed the93double-flashing94 pulse of light again. this time it was located 1-2deg sw of locate were itwas first observed. at that time i went to the house to get my significant otherin hopes that she would also be able to witness this light  confirm my previousobservations. almost immediately upon returning to my telescope we both observedthe93double-flashing94 pulse of light, and it was observed again by both of us 2-3min later. mysignificant other witnessed a third93double-flashing94 pulse of light, but i missed this one as i was looking elsewhere.Additionally, i witnessed 2 more93double-flashing94 pulses of light the last coming at 925pm pdt. these were seen alone as mysignificant other had returned to the house.Again, all of the observations were made in 10deg x 5deg area of the sky, over a25-30min period. the light itself was more or less pinpoint like that of a star,bright white to slightly bluish-white in color, and pulsed 2 times every time itwas observed. the best way that i can describe it is how we have been taught apulsar would look like. it did not appear to have any movement, either constantor random, but rather just pulsed in a different location of the aforementioned10deg x 5deg93box94. there was no sound associated with the light whatsoever, as it was anexceptionally quiet that evening.Of note both myself and my significant other also observed 2 separate satellitesthat evening one tracking w to e  the other tracking n to s in addition to thisunexplained pulsing light. upon referencing the website www.Heavens-above.Com ibelieve that i have identified the satellite tracking w to e as the cosmos 1943rocket.There were no iridium flashes, spacejunk, or other known satellite with a pat
content.summary: Unexplained pulsing light in the sky over the s.F.

content.detailedDescription: This happened near cadillac, michigan in may 1983.  i was with others from the uof michigan who were on a canoe trip.  we were sitting around campfires about10:00 pm when i needed to see the area, in the dark, to water a tree!  therewere no roads or houses in this area, a clear cool night.  then suddenly i wassurprised by a bright white light, shining down at the tree-top level.  it wasapprox. 10 feet in diameter, a disk, with solid light shining down from itsentire bottom.  it made no sound, but moved a foot or two from side to side. its light made many shadows through the trees and they, the shadows all moved,hence movement by the craft.  it was about 250 feet away from me, and my friendswere behind me some 300 feet.  as they were all new engineers, too theoryminded, i wasted no time going back to tell them to see.  i walked slowlytowards the craft, through the woods.  i was going to walk right into and underthe light.  i never got closer than 100 feet.  the light was so bright that inever could actually see the craft itself.  also i was looking through trees,although thin.  at about 100 feet away the craft stopped moving and simplydisappeared!  the light went out and there was no evidence of it.  when iexamined the ground moments later.  i watched this light for about 10 minutes. i was not drunk, or high, or crazy!  i was 25 years old then.  the forest consisted of thinly populated pine trees.

In my room,looking for interdimensionals.                                      a light.                                                                     adisk.                                                                       dreams of  war.                                                              abright disk. it dissapeared.

content.summary: Pulsating hum and sphere lights verticle and horiz

content.detailedDescription: This is the second time that my wife and i have seen a sphere hovering around 25-30 degrees in the west. it stayed stationary and had pulsating lights that changed while several different lights all different colors pulsated. it stayed in the same place for around 15 mins. then slowly moved away moving to the west. i repoted seeing it to your organization last saturday night after seeing it for the first tiime. i saw it again, while alone, on monday 9-15-03. we have had trouble with our 8mm sony camcorder, but i did get it on camera this time.Thanks steven ps if you call please leave message on machine and if i'm home i will pick up i screen all calls

Ufo reportstate section director, mufonlasighting date: 7/23/02sighting time: 10:15/10:20 pmsighting location: marina del rey, caonly a few minutes prior to my neighbors call, id gone to bed in the forwardv-berth of my 30 catalina sailboat on which i live aboard. when leslie scottogalbreath called me by phone with alarm in his voice, i was surprised to findhim reporting a ufo to me (i voiced my doubt as to his sincerity because scottois a comedian who constantly uses my interest in ufos as material for routine comedic assassinations of my character). he reiterated that he was not kidding and that i should come topsideimmediately for a look. i popped the hatch over my head and moved upward on deckto see something which made absolutely no sense whatsoever:above me nearly 90 degrees but slightly north and heading directly overhead tothe south-southwest was a brightly lit array of lights which looked like theywere configured to an invisible structure which all connected to what appearedto be a central jet aircraft. flying at about 15 to 18 thousand feet, theatmospheric bounce seemed to illuminate the bottom of what looked like a typicaljet, but that is where typical ended.There is always jet noise from being very close to lax.. this was the case asthis object went over. there were other jets in the area. what sound i mighthave attributed to this object would not be accurate based on���our proximity to los angeles airport. to the right and left side of this central craft was a formation of whatlooked like rotating red navigational beacons. to the right were a series ofthree outboard beacons, the first one being the only one that was not rotating,constant, and red. each beacon was equally spaced on either side of this craft.The distance from each beacon to one another was at least three full wingspansof the central crafts main wingspan. that wingspan was approximately mythumbnail width at arms length. relative to the central craft, none of theserotating red lights moved independently of one another as if to be fixed to somesuperstructure and connected somehow to the central craft. to the left of this craft and starting outboard at the same distance as theright side were approximately six of these beacons making the left wing appear much longer. at the farthest outboard end of the left side formation wasa smaller white light trailing behind its respective leader as if it were beingdragged by this leading edge beacon. this gave the impression that this wingwas squared off at the left end. the distance from these two lights whichformed this termination was about four fuselage lengths of the central craft. there did not appear to be any visible structure to the larger wing formed bythese outer beacons, though, there was absolutely no variation in spacingvisible which might have been caused by independent buffeting from windturbulence or speed differences. these beacons and lights seemed fixed to arigid but invisible framework.Each red rotating beacon seemed larger than what it should have appeared to havebeen for its distance and did not seem to be attached to the bottom ofanything like individual fighter aircraft or the like. they looked like they were just oversizedflying red beacons, clear and bright. i dont remember anything significantabout what should have been normal sized navigational lighting on the centralcraft.If there was a "superstructure" to this formation, the sweep angle of the mainwing from the central crafts leading edge was the source for any "attachment". this formations angle might have been pitched slightly forward of the angle ofthe central craft wings leading edge.The reasoning for such a configuration made no sense. any superstructurenecessary to keep such a formation fully fixed in place as it appeared, wouldhave been ripped apart by air turbulence from the speed this craft traveled at. on the other hand, if there was a much larger main craft partially "cloaked",then this would explain such an odd sighting.The duration of our sighting was approximately a minute and a half until this configuration of lights and craft movedout of sight to our south southwest. that path would have taken it directlyacross the western end of the lax active runways. we watched these lights from our different positions in the marina about 30yards from each other. scotto was watching through binoculars with our mutualfriend larry hansen.Since that night mufonla has received at least two additional reports fromdifferent cities within la county. these are hawthorne and silverlake. thewitness in silverlake took several seconds of videotape. our director ofinvestigations will assign an independent investigator to these reports and,because im an artist, i will also illustrate what i witnessed.Mark hunzikerstate section director, mufonlawilliam h casey wrote: this is the other report of apparently the same object over silverlake afew minutes after the fist sighting. mark also saw the same object fly over hissailboat in the same time frame, but i dont have the details of his sighting.I talked to the witness (jesus guzman) last night and he would be happyto show us the few seconds of video that he took. i left a message with ralph tocall jesus (what a thought...Lol) as soon as possible. i will be out of town for a week beginning tomorrow, so ann, if you areavailable, please coordinate this. since steve has volunteered for the hawthornesighting, maybe he couldresearch both?Bill c.--------- forwarded message ----------from: to: "william h casey" date: wed, 24 jul 2002 10:43:18 -0700subject: fw: sighting report formmessage-id: <000a01c23339$99608ff0$6601a8c0@atlas>----- original message -----to: sent: tuesday, july 23, 2002 10:51 pmsubject: sighting report formbelow is the result of your feedback form. it was submitted by () on tuesday, july 23, 2002 at 22:51:49---------------------------------------------------------------------------contact: j guzmanemail: jesguzman2002@yahoo.Comdesc: walked out unto my patio at 10:21 pm on 7-23-02 and saw a string oflights, ran inside my house, grabed my camcorder, recorded this spectacle for afew seconds. there were about 20 lights flashing a cherry red color and all ofthem were flashing. objects heading south east. they started off in atriangular pattern and started forming a cresent shape. some objects werefurther away and not part of the configuration.State: californiacounty: los angelescity: silverlakecountry: united statestime: 10:21am/pm: pmtimezone: pacific : pacific time (us & canada); tijuanaduration: 3duration units: secsmh: minday of sighting: 23month of sighting: julyear of sighting: 2002viewed from: outdoorsviewed thru: otherother view through: camcorderlocation: citysky condition: clearprecipitation: nonefirst direction: westmoved from: westmoved to: southeastfirst ufo elevation: 1/4last ufo elevation: 1/4closest ufo distance: unknownalso in area: helicopterwitness sighted: afternumber of light(s): 20shape of light(s): lightscolor(s) of light(s): cherry redsound: nonesmell: nonespeed: 10 miles per hourtimes size of star: 1x
bright as: a starno. of other witnesses: 0name of primary witness: jesus guzmancontact information for primary witness: 323-662-5377use primary witness name?: mayuse other witnesses names?: mayday of report: 23month of report: julyear of report: 2002------------------------------------------------------------------ original message -----to: sent: wednesday, july 24, 2002 4:51 amsubject: sighting report form> below is the result of your feedback form. it was submitted by> () on wednesday, july 24, 2002 at 04:51:39>--------------------------------------------------------------------------->> contact: mike reilly>> email: riles35@aol.Com>> desc: i was in the city of hawthorne with two friends and we were outsidetalking. some red lights approaching from the north (going south) caught ourattention. we saw a very huge boomerang or v shaped object, with a bright whitelight at the "nose", and red blinking lights around its perimeter (maybe four orfive on either side of the white light). i thought it was an airplane at first. we were all pretty impressed with its massive size and we kept the object insight. it traveled north to south, appearing to follow the coastline, and wekept sight of it until it was too far away to see in the southern horizon. it was totally silent and seemed to glide slowly across the sky. this occurred at about 10:15 p.M. (give or take a few minutes) on tuesday, july 23, 2002, and i am totally shocked it did not make the news - it flew right over the lax flight path.>please limit your narrative to 2000 words (equivalent to 6 typed pages).
content.summary: Strange array of lights seen near lax july 23, 200

content.detailedDescription: 1. driving on interstate 59 south 2. 3 bright lights in sky far off 3. tower or airplane 4. excited, nervous, shock 5. as we got closer it was hovering over interstate exit to carraway blvd and red light in middle was flashing 6. while exiting on carraway blvd object disappeared and never seen again

A foul odor eminating from the above apartment was keeping me awakei was facing my computer when i heard a whispering sound.  i opened the door tosee what it was and a gray non fighter aircraftlarger than a fighter flew overmy two story apartment at an altitude such that if i were standing on the roof iwould have been struck by the plane. it made no more than a whisper.  i sat outunder a tree it was late at night at the lakeside xii apartment complex and iheard jet aircraft and i saw in the sky a large aircraft high in the sky with awing formation like a b-52.  a few minuetes later a dark blue black triangularshaped craft appeared to my right flying at very low altitude - as i looked fromthe stern it flashed lights at me in a manner pardon the comparison reminicentof close encounters of the third kind.  note which may be taken with skepticismfor the past few years i have been involuntary involved in what i suspect is aninformationdisinformation campaign involving mj-12 and my status as a mindcontrolled intelligence operative drafted into the service if what i have beentold by telepathy is true of the us navy at the rank of ensign and majic-12.  idid meet nsa director w.E. odom prior to the active phase of the operation and igraduated from yale college in 1998.  thank you for your patience -- i realizethis sounds quite odd.
content.summary: Triangular ufo in conjunction with near silent pla

content.detailedDescription: At 120 am sept 15, 2003driving hwy 2 south 30 km north from airdre, alberta canada.Seen ojbject depart from ground appoximately at an 25degree angle... thought itwas an airplane. very bright colour gold crystal shiny bright light... likelooking directly into the sun. the ojbect stop then went 90 degrees west in aflash.. and stopped. i was personally scared... that is when i pulled over tothe side of the highway to watch the lights. appox. 7 other cars and two semispulled over to watch this light as well. 2 north bound vehicals and 5 southboundvehicals stopped and pulled over.  hovered for over 20 minutes... made only twomovements in the twenty minutes. left to right to right left. never did losesight of the object. watch for 12 hour as it flashed like a dimond or a brightflag . lights spakled. was too scared to leave my vehical to talk to otherwitness. finally, my gut instinct told me to leave. the object was eitherdirecting or looking for something. light flashshed in direct spots. only onecolour. very pretty colour and pure. there really are no any words to descripthe colour. i was embarressed and scared. i called the rcmp royal canadainmountain police to see if anyone called regarding an object in the sky.Than i left.  so far ive come up with possible answers... a natural gas flare,in the old days they would use a bow and arrow to light a gas flare and  or somenew technology of fire cracker. it wasnt something that flashed thandisappreared. it was a very pretty colour and was int he sky for a long time.
content.locationName: 30 KM North of airdre, Al, Alberta

content.detailedDescription: On september 15th at about 445am, i was driving home to fairlawn ohio. i was oni-77 northbound and was just passing the copley rd. exit. i saw lights thatapperaed to be floating in the sky. i couldnt tell the shape but it looked likeit could be a plane or helicopter. as i looked at it i realized it was notmoving. i thought that maybe it was just the lights on top of a cellular toweror something. i couldnt see anything under them however. as i continued down thehighway about 30 seconds later, i saw what appeared to be another group oflights either crossing the highway, or just to the left side of it headingtowards the other group of lights. i thought it was a plane at first but itseemed to be moving too slow, then i thought it was a helicopter. i rolled downmy window and didnt hear a sound. as it passed over the trees to my left, icould see the lights were in a triangular shape. there was a white light at thetip and two white lights behind that. the back two were red.W
content.summary: Saw 1-2 triangular formations of light in the sky
